text: lelo, uhulichize kulawa kilanga, haluga ha hegwe na udite kota vyoulingona inoga na udite lyoneche liwele mjenzi ayo kangukulanda, leka wanhu wa isi zeng'ha walizele itagwa lya hegwe na wakudumbe kota vyowalingudita wanhu wa hegwe Isilaeli leka nawo wavizele kota ng'handa ayi yondiizenjile naichemigwa kwa itagwa lya hegwe.
